file_insights.primary_responsibility: Product management page with CRUD operations

patterns_discovered: Optimistic UI updates with error handling
Detailed state management for complex form interactions
gotchas_discovered: Complex state management with multiple interdependent states
Handling nullable and optional fields in TypeScript
Managing UI visibility and interactions conditionally
Error state management across async operations
recommendations: Consider extracting complex form logic into a custom hook
Implement more granular error messages for different failure scenarios
Add client-side form validation before submission
Consider pagination or virtualization for large product lists
Create more comprehensive unit and integration tests
